definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: We dined on chicken, potatoes, salad and apple-pie.
sentences.chinese: 正餐我們喫的是雞，土豆，涼拌菜和蘋果餡餅。

sentences.english: Because you tend to feel full sooner, you eat less of your main course.
sentences.chinese: 因爲喝湯會讓你很快覺得飽了，所以正餐就能少喫點。

sentences.english: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.chinese: 他在兩餐之間喫點東西來補充正餐。

sentences.english: Increase of solid food and snacks in between meals are the two concepts.
sentences.chinese: 加的固體食品和正餐中間的加餐是兩個概念。

sentences.english: He is used to dine off steak and salad.
sentences.chinese: 他正餐總是喫牛排和色拉。

sentences.english: By the way, it is a dinner.
Breakfast in Paris, dinner in Hang Kong, luggage in Peoria.
sentences.chinese: 早餐在巴黎，正餐在香港，行李在皮奧里亞。

sentences.english: Especially if it's for a dinner or food.
sentences.chinese: 特別是在爲你的正餐或食物付費時，不要依賴它們。

sentences.english: We'll dine with our friends tonight at about seven.
sentences.chinese: 今晚7時左右我們將和朋友們進正餐。

sentences.english: On Sundays, his landlady provided dinner as well as breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 逢星期天，女房東除早飯外還供應他正餐。

sentences.english: Eating prandial later, everybody still can choose a desert subsequently.
sentences.chinese: 在喫完正餐之後，每人還可以隨後選擇甜點。

sentences.english: The restaurant served a roll with the meal.
sentences.chinese: 這家餐廳提供正餐時加有一個麪包卷。

sentences.english: Need one last serving after dinner?
sentences.chinese: 正餐後還需要最後的一份嗎？

sentences.english: But, the people did not know how to ues the dinnerware to eat their food.
sentences.chinese: 但是，人們不知道怎樣用正餐餐具來喫食物。

sentences.english: Drink one glass of water before every meal or snack.
sentences.chinese: 每次喫正餐或零食前都要喝一杯水。

sentences.english: He dines on a chicken or a scrap of mutton.
sentences.chinese: 一隻小雞，或一小塊羊肉，就算他一頓正餐了。

definition: afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)
to have three meals a day
